text.name: info1
text.text: An arcade game or coin-op game is a coin-operated entertainment machine.

text.name: info2
text.text: Most arcade games are video games, pinball machines, electro-mechanical

text.name: info3
text.text: games, redemption games or merchandisers. While exact dates are debated, the

text.name: info4
text.text: golden age of arcade video games is usually defined as a period beginning

text.name: info5
text.text: sometime in the late 1970s and ending sometime in the mid-1980s. Excluding a

text.name: info6
text.text: brief resurgence in the early 1990s, the arcade industry subsequently

text.name: info7
text.text: declined in the Western hemisphere as competing home video game consoles

text.name: info8
text.text: increased in their graphics and game-play capability and decreased in cost.

text.name: info10
text.text: This system gathers all arcade emulators in one.
